Attributes.description: Theory and research on individual differences in motivation, emotion, and social behaviour.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) PSYC 100 or (b) two of PSYC 101, PSYC 102, PSYC 205, PSYC 207, PSYC 208, PSYC 216, PSYC 217, PSYC 277. (Strongly recommended: PSYC 102 and either PSYC 216 or one of PSYC 217 or 277)
